title: Workplace English Proficiency Improvement Program Using Integrated Problem-Based Learning (IPBL)

context.prior_knowledge: Basic English communication skills and understanding of job-related English expressions
context.additional_context: Targeting office/administrative professionals to improve English proficiency applicable to real work scenarios, primarily through personal device-based learning activities

learning_goals: Learners can utilize workplace-related English expressions with over 80% accuracy during problem-solving processes based on real-world scenarios.
Learners can collaborate with peers to analyze complex workplace problems in English and propose solutions with over 70% participation.
Learners can diagnose their English communication skills through formative assessment and develop five or more improvement plans.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
